Base Model¶

class BaseOrdinalModel[source]¶

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class for ordinal regression models.

abstractmethod fit(X, y)[source]¶

Train the model.

Parameters:

  • X (ndarray)

  • y (ndarray)

abstractmethod predict(X)[source]¶

Predict ordinal labels.

Parameters:

X (ndarray)

Return type:

ndarray

abstractmethod predict_proba(X)[source]¶

Predict probability distributions over ordinal classes.

Parameters:

X (ndarray)

Return type:

ndarray

abstractmethod get_params(deep=True)[source]¶

Return model parameters for scikit-learn compatibility.

ordinal_xai
